title: I Don't Have A Good Feeling About This
itunes:title: I Don't Have A Good Feeling About This
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m ready to call off my engagement but I need your advice first. My fiancé and I are both divorced and our first marriages were terrible. I’ve been working on my issues so I can be a better wife this time. My fiancé, on the other hand, does not think he has anything to work on, but he admitted to cheating on his first wife, so he’s got some baggage. Now after 5 years of being with him, I think he’s cheating on me.............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m ready to call off my engagement but I need your advice first. My fiancé and I are both divorced and our first marriages were terrible. I’ve been working on my issues so I can be a better wife this time. My fiancé, on the other hand, does not think he has anything to work on, but he admitted to cheating on his first wife, so he’s got some baggage. Now after 5 years of being with him, I think he’s cheating on me.............
